nodes.text: Vinta Harvest Ale was an alcoholic beverage brewed by Dugs and Vinta Corporation on Malastare. The company that made it, of the same name as the beverage, was owned by Grans, who hosted a podracing circuit called the Vinta Harvest Classic, which included the Phoebos Memorial Run, the largest podracing course on Malastare.
When the digital version of Omnibus: Emissaries and Assassins was released in 2015 by Marvel Comics, the label from the bottle was removed.
